dictionary.name: Sample English Dictionary
dictionary.description: A sample dictionary with common English words

words.definition: The occurrence and development of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way
examples: A fortunate stroke of serendipity brought the two old friends together
words.notes: From Persian fairy tale 'The Three Princes of Serendip'

words.definition: Lasting for a very short time
examples: The beauty of cherry blossoms is ephemeral
Fame can be ephemeral in the digital age
words.notes: From Greek 'ephemeros' meaning lasting only a day

examples: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society
The ubiquitous presence of social media affects daily life

words.definition: Sweet or musical; pleasant to hear
examples: Her mellifluous voice captivated the audience
The mellifluous tones of the violin filled the concert hall

words.definition: Having a ready insight into and understanding of things
examples: The detective's perspicacious observations solved the case
She made a perspicacious analysis of the market trends
